title: Goldene Aue, Saxony-Anhalt
text:
Goldene Aue is a "<a href="Verbandsgemeinde">Verbandsgemeinde</a>" ("collective municipality") in the <a href="Mansfeld-S%C3%BCdharz">Mansfeld-Südharz</a> district, in <a href="Saxony-Anhalt">Saxony-Anhalt</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. Before 1 January 2010, it was a "<a href="Verwaltungsgemeinschaft">Verwaltungsgemeinschaft</a>". It is situated south and west of <a href="Sangerhausen">Sangerhausen</a>. It is named after the <a href="Goldene%20Aue">Goldene Aue</a> valley. The seat of the "Verbandsgemeinde" is in Kelbra.
The "Verbandsgemeinde" Goldene Aue consists of the following municipalities:
